name: location of
content:
Gets the location of a given sprite.

This block can be used to get the exact location of the center of a sprite, even when it moves around the screen.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: The first sprite is drawn at a random location, but the second sprite is always drawn at the same place.

examples.name: Example 2
examples.description: This block allows one sprite to move towards another, no matter where it is on the screen. Here is a simple tag game where you can press the spacebar to make the chaser follow the runner.

palette_params.name: sprite
palette_params.description: The sprite or sprite group whose location is being called

short_description: Gets the location of a given sprite.
